remarks: A hyperplane's generating vector does not belong to the hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lshpnel.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lshpnel.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lshpnel.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lshpnel.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lshpnel.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lshpnel.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. H ) $.
lshpnel.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lshpnel.e $e |- ( ph -> ( U .(+) ( N ` { X } ) ) = V ) $.
lshpnel $p |- ( ph -> -. X e. U ) $.
